SELECT SUM(CREAT_CO) AS statsCo
, SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) AS statsDate
, SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2) AS statsDate
, SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 7, 2) AS statsDate
FROM COMTSBBSSUMMARY WHERE 1 = 1
AND OCCRRNC_DE BETWEEN #fromDate# AND #toDate# AND STATS_SE = #statsKind#
AND DETAIL_STATS_SE = #detailStatsKind#
GROUP BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) ORDER BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4)
GROUP BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2) ORDER BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2)
GROUP BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 7, 2) ORDER BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 7, 2)

SELECT SUM(TOT_RDCNT) AS statsCo
, SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) AS statsDate
, SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2) AS statsDate
, SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 7, 2) AS statsDate
FROM COMTSBBSSUMMARY WHERE 1 = 1
AND OCCRRNC_DE BETWEEN #fromDate# AND #toDate# AND STATS_SE = #statsKind#
AND DETAIL_STATS_SE = #detailStatsKind#
GROUP BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) ORDER BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4)
GROUP BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2) ORDER BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2)
GROUP BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 7, 2) ORDER BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 7, 2)

SELECT NVL(SUM(TOT_RDCNT) / (CASE SUM(CREAT_CO) WHEN 0 THEN 1 ELSE SUM(CREAT_CO) END), 0) AS avrgInqireCo
, SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) AS statsDate
, SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2) AS statsDate
, SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 7, 2) AS statsDate
FROM COMTSBBSSUMMARY WHERE 1 = 1
AND OCCRRNC_DE BETWEEN #fromDate# AND #toDate# AND STATS_SE = #statsKind#
AND DETAIL_STATS_SE = #detailStatsKind#
GROUP BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) ORDER BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4)
GROUP BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2) ORDER BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2)
GROUP BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 7, 2) ORDER BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 7, 2)

SELECT a.OCCRRNC_DE AS statsDate , a.TOP_NTCR_ID AS topNtcepersonId , COUNT(b.NTT_ID) AS topNtcepersonCo FROM ( SELECT OCCRRNC_DE , TOP_NTCR_ID FROM COMTSBBSSUMMARY WHERE 1 = 1 AND OCCRRNC_DE BETWEEN #fromDate# AND #toDate# AND STATS_SE = #statsKind#
AND DETAIL_STATS_SE = #detailStatsKind#
) a, COMTNBBS b WHERE 1=1
AND a.TOP_NTCR_ID IS NOT NULL AND b.NTCR_ID = a.TOP_NTCR_ID
AND b.NTCR_ID IS NOT NULL GROUP BY a.OCCRRNC_DE, a.TOP_NTCR_ID ORDER BY a.OCCRRNC_DE
SELECT a.STATS_SE AS statsKind FROM COMTSBBSSUMMARY a WHERE a.OCCRRNC_DE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'YYYYMMDD') AND a.STATS_SE = #statsKind# AND a.DETAIL_STATS_SE = #detailStatsKind#

SELECT NVL(NVL(SUM(a.RDCNT),0) / (CASE COUNT(a.NTT_ID) WHEN 0 THEN 1 END), 0) AS avrgInqireCo FROM COMTNBBS a, COMTNBBSMASTER b WHERE a.BBS_ID = b.BBS_ID AND TO_CHAR(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'YYYYMMDD') AND b.BBS_ATTRB_CODE = #detailStatsKind#

SELECT a.NTT_ID AS mxmmInqireBbsId FROM COMTNBBS a, COMTNBBSMASTER b WHERE a.BBS_ID = b.BBS_ID AND a.RDCNT = (SELECT MAX(c.RDCNT) FROM COMTNBBS c, COMTNBBSMASTER d WHERE c.BBS_ID = d.BBS_ID AND c.RDCNT > 0 AND TO_CHAR(c.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'YYYYMMDD') AND d.BBS_TY_CODE = #detailStatsKind#) AND TO_CHAR(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'YYYYMMDD') AND b.BBS_TY_CODE = #detailStatsKind# AND rownum = 1

SELECT a.NTT_ID AS mxmmInqireBbsId FROM COMTNBBS a, COMTNBBSMASTER b WHERE a.BBS_ID = b.BBS_ID AND a.RDCNT = (SELECT MAX(c.RDCNT) FROM COMTNBBS c, COMTNBBSMASTER d WHERE c.BBS_ID = d.BBS_ID AND c.RDCNT > 0 AND TO_CHAR(c.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'YYYYMMDD') AND d.BBS_ATTRB_CODE = #detailStatsKind#) AND TO_CHAR(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'YYYYMMDD') AND b.BBS_ATTRB_CODE = #detailStatsKind# AND rownum = 1

SELECT a.NTT_ID AS mxmmInqireBbsId FROM COMTNBBS a, COMTNBBSMASTER b, COMTNTMPLATINFO c WHERE a.BBS_ID = b.BBS_ID AND a.RDCNT = (SELECT MAX(d.RDCNT) FROM COMTNBBS d, COMTNBBSMASTER e, COMTNTMPLATINFO f WHERE d.BBS_ID = e.BBS_ID AND d.RDCNT > 0 AND TO_CHAR(d.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'YYYYMMDD') AND e.TMPLAT_ID = f.TMPLAT_ID AND f.TMPLAT_SE_CODE = #detailStatsKind#) AND TO_CHAR(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'YYYYMMDD') AND b.TMPLAT_ID = c.TMPLAT_ID AND c.TMPLAT_SE_CODE = #detailStatsKind# AND rownum = 1

SELECT a.NTT_ID AS mummInqireBbsId FROM COMTNBBS a, COMTNBBSMASTER b WHERE a.BBS_ID = b.BBS_ID AND a.RDCNT = (SELECT MIN(c.RDCNT) FROM COMTNBBS c, COMTNBBSMASTER d WHERE c.BBS_ID = d.BBS_ID AND c.RDCNT > 0 AND TO_CHAR(c.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'YYYYMMDD') AND d.BBS_TY_CODE = #detailStatsKind#) AND TO_CHAR(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'YYYYMMDD') AND b.BBS_TY_CODE = #detailStatsKind# AND rownum = 1

SELECT a.NTT_ID AS mummInqireBbsId FROM COMTNBBS a, COMTNBBSMASTER b WHERE a.BBS_ID = b.BBS_ID AND a.RDCNT = (SELECT MIN(c.RDCNT) FROM COMTNBBS c, COMTNBBSMASTER d WHERE c.BBS_ID = d.BBS_ID AND c.RDCNT > 0 AND TO_CHAR(c.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'YYYYMMDD') AND d.BBS_ATTRB_CODE = #detailStatsKind#) AND TO_CHAR(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'YYYYMMDD') AND b.BBS_ATTRB_CODE = #detailStatsKind# AND rownum = 1

SELECT a.NTT_ID AS mummInqireBbsId FROM COMTNBBS a, COMTNBBSMASTER b, COMTNTMPLATINFO c WHERE a.BBS_ID = b.BBS_ID AND a.RDCNT = (SELECT MIN(d.RDCNT) FROM COMTNBBS d, COMTNBBSMASTER e, COMTNTMPLATINFO f WHERE d.BBS_ID = e.BBS_ID AND d.RDCNT > 0 AND TO_CHAR(d.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'YYYYMMDD') AND e.TMPLAT_ID = f.TMPLAT_ID AND f.TMPLAT_SE_CODE = #detailStatsKind#) AND TO_CHAR(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'YYYYMMDD') AND b.TMPLAT_ID = c.TMPLAT_ID AND c.TMPLAT_SE_CODE = #detailStatsKind# AND rownum = 1

SELECT c.topNtcepersonId FROM (SELECT COUNT(a.NTT_ID) AS topNtcepersonCo , a.NTCR_ID AS topNtcepersonId FROM COMTNBBS a, COMTNBBSMASTER b WHERE a.BBS_ID = b.BBS_ID AND a.NTCR_ID IS NOT NULL AND TO_CHAR(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'YYYYMMDD') AND b.BBS_TY_CODE = #detailStatsKind# GROUP BY a.NTCR_ID) c WHERE c.topNtcepersonCo = (SELECT MAX(f.topNtcepersonCo) FROM (SELECT COUNT(d.NTT_ID) AS topNtcepersonCo , d.NTCR_ID AS topNtcepersonId FROM COMTNBBS d, COMTNBBSMASTER e WHERE d.BBS_ID = e.BBS_ID AND d.NTCR_ID IS NOT NULL AND TO_CHAR(d.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'YYYYMMDD') AND e.BBS_TY_CODE = #detailStatsKind# GROUP BY d.NTCR_ID) f) AND rownum = 1

SELECT c.topNtcepersonId FROM (SELECT COUNT(a.NTT_ID) AS topNtcepersonCo , a.NTCR_ID AS topNtcepersonId FROM COMTNBBS a, COMTNBBSMASTER b WHERE a.BBS_ID = b.BBS_ID AND a.NTCR_ID IS NOT NULL AND TO_CHAR(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'YYYYMMDD') AND b.BBS_ATTRB_CODE = #detailStatsKind# GROUP BY a.NTCR_ID) c WHERE c.topNtcepersonCo = (SELECT MAX(f.topNtcepersonCo) FROM (SELECT COUNT(d.NTT_ID) AS topNtcepersonCo , d.NTCR_ID AS topNtcepersonId FROM COMTNBBS d, COMTNBBSMASTER e WHERE d.BBS_ID = e.BBS_ID AND d.NTCR_ID IS NOT NULL AND TO_CHAR(d.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'YYYYMMDD') AND e.BBS_ATTRB_CODE = #detailStatsKind# GROUP BY d.NTCR_ID) f) AND rownum = 1

SELECT c.topNtcepersonId FROM (SELECT COUNT(a.NTT_ID) AS topNtcepersonCo , a.NTCR_ID AS topNtcepersonId FROM COMTNBBS a, COMTNBBSMASTER b, COMTNTMPLATINFO t1 WHERE a.BBS_ID = b.BBS_ID AND a.NTCR_ID IS NOT NULL AND TO_CHAR(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'YYYYMMDD') AND b.TMPLAT_ID = t1.TMPLAT_ID AND t1.TMPLAT_SE_CODE = #detailStatsKind# GROUP BY a.NTCR_ID) c WHERE c.topNtcepersonCo = (SELECT MAX(f.topNtcepersonCo) FROM (SELECT COUNT(d.NTT_ID) AS topNtcepersonCo , d.NTCR_ID AS topNtcepersonId FROM COMTNBBS d, COMTNBBSMASTER e, COMTNTMPLATINFO t2 WHERE d.BBS_ID = e.BBS_ID AND d.NTCR_ID IS NOT NULL AND TO_CHAR(d.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'YYYYMMDD') AND e.TMPLAT_ID = t2.TMPLAT_ID AND t2.TMPLAT_SE_CODE = #detailStatsKind# GROUP BY d.NTCR_ID) f) AND rownum = 1

sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO COMTSBBSSUMMARY ( OCCRRNC_DE, STATS_SE, DETAIL_STATS_SE, CREAT_CO, TOT_RDCNT, AVRG_RDCNT, TOP_INQIRE_BBSCTT_ID, MUMM_INQIRE_BBSCTT_ID, TOP_NTCR_ID ) VALUES ( TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'YYYYMMDD'), #statsKind#, #detailStatsKind#, #creatCo#, #totInqireCo#, #avrgInqireCo#, #mxmmInqireBbsId#, #mummInqireBbsId#, #topNtcepersonId# )
